subject: Order Shipping Address change
description_text: Hi, my name is Ulises Ramirez and my order number is SSN2127. I ordered the Simsonn Pro X Ultra control box and I accidentally placed the incorrect, if the address could be changed from 8003 South IH-35 Apt 3031 to 12531 State Highway 71 Apt 1315, Bee Cave TX, 78738 that would be amazing. Thanks!

conversations.body_text: Hi Ulisesrr980,    Your package has been shipped, and we are intercepting it and changing the address for you, please don't worry.
Hi Ulisesrr980,    The logistics company has confirmed that your address has been successfully changed. Please do not worry.
